name: TropicalWeatherOutlook
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Tropical Weather Outlook Briefing provides Tropical Weather Outlook reports for the Atlantic, Eastern Pacific and Central Pacific regions from the National Hurricane Center in Miami, FL and the Central Pacific Hurricane Center in Honolulu, HI. The outlooks are provided by their respective forecast centers during northern hemisphere hurricane season from June 1st through November 30th. At other times of the year, reports are not usually issued and this briefing will not be updated. During active tropical systems, updates are issued approximately every three hours at 10 minutes after 0000, 0300, 0600, 0900, 1200, 1500, 1800 and 2100 hours UTC. At other times, updates are issued less frequently. By default, the Atlantic Tropical Weather Outlook is enabled when the skill is enabled. Through the skill settings page, this report can be turned off and replaced with any or all of the other available outlook reports (Eastern Pacific Tropical Outlook and Central Pacific Tropical Outlook).

DISCLAIMER: This skill is for information purposes only and IS NOT to be used for the protection of life or property. You SHOULD NOT rely on these audio reports to receive watches or warnings. This skill IS NOT endorsed by or supported by any government agency including the National Weather Service and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
